text: Manusera kache ki ascarya lagache ye, ami ohi pathiyechi tadera'i madhya theke ekajanera kache yena tini manusake satarka karena ebam susambada suniye dena imanadaraganake ye, tamdera jan'ya satya maryada rayeche tamdera palanakartara kache. Kapherara balate lagala, nihsandehe e loka prakasya yadukara.
